name: Chiori
desc:
"The Thundering Seamstress" Chiori

Couturiere of Countless Colors

imgDesc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
Fighting With Her Eyes Shut Tamoto

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Select 1 Summon from 3 <color=#ffffff>Chiori's Automaton Dolls</color>

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
Varied humanoid automatons of Chiori's that can not only attack autonomously but also provide varied buffs.

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#ffd780>Geo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>While this card is on the field: Physical DMG</color> dealt by your Chiori is converted to <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> , and <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> dealt by Normal Attacks +1.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>When this card is on the field, after you use a Skill:</color> Switch to your next character. (Once per Round)
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>When this card is on the field, after any of your characters other than Chiori use a Skill:</color> Deal 1 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> . (Once per Round)
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

talent.key: Fighting With Her Eyes Shut Tamoto
talent.title: Fighting With Her Eyes Shut Tamoto

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>When this card is on the field:</color> Your Chiori and <color=#ffffff>Chiori's Automaton Dolls</color> deal +1 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> . (Twice per Round)
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

<color=#ffd780>Summon</color>
<color=#ffffff>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffffff>When Chiori uses a Normal Attack:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Select</color>
Select 1 card from a specific number of cards and activate its effects.

value.name: In Five Colors Dyed
value.desc:
Chiori: In Five Colors Dyed

"Scraps of color, scatter!"

value.text: Reward for inviting Chiori to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Chiori
value.desc: The owner of Chioriya Boutique. A tailor renowned throughout Fontaine.

customize.name: Chiori
customize.desc:
"The Thundering Seamstress" Chiori

Couturiere of Countless Colors

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"I wrote down the rules, so let's try playing a game."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Chiori's deck excels at using combinations of Summons to deal massive Geo DMG, and can play different Action Cards as support depending on the current state of the game.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Chiori
customize.desc:
"The Thundering Seamstress" Chiori

Couturiere of Countless Colors

customize.name: Kujou Sara
customize.desc:
"Crowfeather Kaburaya" Kujou Sara

"This is an act of righteousness."

customize.name: Gorou
customize.desc:
"Canine Warrior" Gorou

The leader of the pack, leading the soldiers onward!

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

"Scraps of color, scatter!"

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"I haven't lost yet. Now it's time for me to get really serious..."
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Chiori" starts with the Talent Card "In Five Colors Dyed" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.
